meanings.sent1: She felt pain in her clavicles after the fall.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined her clavicles to check for any fractures.
meanings.sent3: Carrying heavy bags made her clavicles feel like they were carrying the weight of the world.
meanings.sent4: Her clavicles were like delicate bridges connecting her shoulders to her chest.
meanings.sent5: The clavicles stood out prominently on the X-ray, resembling graceful arches.

meanings.definition: A pair of bones forming the front part of the shoulder girdle.
meanings.sent1: He learned about the clavicles in his anatomy class.
meanings.sent2: The clavicles provide support for the arms and shoulders.
meanings.sent3: The clavicles looked like two sturdy bridges supporting the upper body.
meanings.sent4: Her clavicles were like twin pillars holding up her shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The clavicles played a crucial role in maintaining proper posture.
